name: The Abduction
description:
A very short Kinetik Visual Novel.  

Chapter 1- It is the intro of the game, establishing the basic plot. 

Made in Visual Novel Maker.  I will switch to RenPy if I decide to continue this project, as the only reason to use the VNM software was to be able to export to HTML, and that didn't work. 

There is a little sexual and political sarcasm, and if the display of a naked girl sprite bothers you, please do not download this file.
